This class represents a CreateEventViewModel
CreateNotificationFragment
CreateNotificationFragment is the Fragment an event organizer will see if they want to send a notification.
CreateNotificationViewModel
 
Database
This class is used to interact with the Firestore database It can be used to fetch, add, edit and delete users It can also be used to add events and check in users to events

EditEventViewModel
 
Event
An object that keeps track of the event data
EventArrayAdaptor
An array adapter for displaying event information and connecting it with the ui
EventFragment
Fragment which contains a list of the events a user has checked into
EventList
A class which keeps track of a list of event objects (all the events on the app)

Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
